说.comment: to speak/say is vastly more common than shuì (to persuade)

吧.comment: Modal particle (suggestion/surmise) is more common than bā (bar)

吗.comment: Question particle is more common than má (what?)

着.comment: Aspect particle (ongoing action) is more common than zhāo (chess move)

啊.comment: Modal particle is more common than ā (interjection)
